titleStmt.title: The church, the proper subject of the new covenant. Delivered first in three sermons at Rochester Afterwards contracted into two, and delivered againe at Gravesend. Together with a covenant to walke with God. By Will: Sandbrooke, LL:B:Ox. and Minister of Margarets Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Sandbrooke, William, d. 1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Wilson for Philemon Stephens,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
